record.description: Stocking shelves in the Hyde Park Coop after the move to 55th Street. [The original Coop was torn down as part of the city's clearance projects. The new site at 55th Street would also face demolition and was rebuilt and dedicated in 1959 at its present site on 1526 E 55th Street.]
record.source: Archival Photographic Files. Addenda. Mildred Mead Photographs
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Curling. Photographer stamp. Address and info from http://coopmarkets.com/history2.html
